name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kanban Combined WIP for Jira Cloud

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to set a combined WIP limit for multiple columns in a Kanban board.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now with the Kanban Combined WIP App for Jira Cloud you can improve your Kanban boards in a very simple way, combining columns and WIPS, adding color and wallpaper to your board, in addition to WIPS by swimlane. It will allow you to zoom, scroll so you can see the board well on small laptop screens. Try it for free!
